data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 10
data.actual_result: You only see a still image and not the animation of the gif.
data.expected_result: You should see the gif animation for the rich embed.
data.short_description: Animation for gifs in embeds not shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Create/receive an embed with a gif for the thumbnail, author, footer or the image of it - Observe it
